video_description: This is a review of the acer Iconia Tab W500, powered by Windows 7, this is a wifi version.
title: acer Iconia Tab W500 Hardware Review

comments.text: I have one too. Thanks for mentioning the acer ring for﻿ web browser I very seldom use it, but I'll give it try for web browsing.  My two down points with it is that while it has a 32GB HDD; however half of it was used up w/preinstalled stuff.  Next was weight.  I added a SD card to regain more storage.  Overall it suits my needs so I'm okay with it.  Thanks for posting.

comments.text: Thank you for all of the feedback everyone...especially about the cat...who I didn't even realize was in the video.  His name is Max btw and I'm pretty sure﻿ he will make into more of the videos by "accident." Also, be sure to check out Equal Entanglement on facebook and twitter @EqualEntangle.

comments.text:
HELP!!!
Does anyone know how to get Netflix to play smooth in HD with no audio lag?

Also, I the five finger touch no longer works, I think I accidentally deleted a program﻿ controlling that when I was getting some extra space on the hard drive.

I was able to squeeze out 5GB, but can't understand what is taking up all the other space...I moved all other files to the SD card.

Any help is greatly appreciated.
